Package at.htlkaindorf.entities.collectables

Class Coin

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
at.htlkaindorf.entities.collectables.Collectable
at.htlkaindorf.entities.collectables.Coin
public class Coin
extends Collectable
The coin class is used to create collectable coins for the player. It extends the collectable class.
